title: Online Intensive Workshop on Product Design Utilizing Real-Time Video Interviews

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational product design theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Short-term, practice-oriented course for current practitioners focusing intensively on core elements of product design (user experience, prototyping, evaluation methods) in an online environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of each stage in the product design process through real-time video interviews.
Learners collaborate with team members using online collaboration tools to design product prototypes and engage in iterative feedback exchanges.
Learners self-diagnose their design outcomes and propose improvement plans through formative assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
